name: News&Views
0:
”Alexa, open n. l. e. c. news”
”Alexa, ask n. l. e. c. news for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start n. l. e. c. news”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: n. l. e. c. news
Developer Terms of Use
des: News and Views analyzes the news from an objective viewpoint not found by other news entities driven by the almighty dollar. Host Charles Hale speaks with guests as they tell it the way it is, un-intimidated and determined to put a human face on news that otherwise is impersonal and corporate driven.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
